text: int main ( ) { int t ; long long int i , n , cost = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & n ) ; long long int a [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & a [ i ] ) ; } for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] > a [ i - 1 ] ) { cost = cost + a [ i - 1 ] ; } else { cost = cost + a [ i ] ; } } printf ( "%lld\n" , cost ) ; cost = 0 ; } return 0 ; }
